targets.query: SELECT MODE(last) FROM ( SELECT last("leader") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-new_leader" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host_id )
SELECT LAST(median) FROM ( SELECT median(live_count) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND live_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s) )

SELECT MEDIAN("host_count") AS "total" FROM ( SELECT COUNT("count") as host_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host_id ) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT ROUND(MEAN("sum")) FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )

SELECT MAX("median_sum") FROM ( SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS median_sum FROM (SELECT SUM("count") AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(1s), host_id) GROUP BY time(1s) )
SELECT MEDIAN(tx_count) AS transactions FROM (SELECT SUM("count")  AS tx_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY host_id) WHERE tx_count > 0
SELECT MEDIAN("vote_count") FROM ( SELECT sum("count") as vote_count FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."vote-native" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY host_id )
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT min("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("duration_ms", 99) FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT median("broadcast_count") AS "broadcast_total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND broadcast_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT median("live_count") AS "live_total" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."cluster_info-num_nodes" WHERE $timeFilter AND live_count > 0 GROUP BY time(5s)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "packets" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."packets-recv_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count") / 2 AS "transactions" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-record_transactions" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2s) FILL(0)

select median("tx_count") as "transactions" from (select sum("count") / 2  as "tx_count" from "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-replay_transactions" where $timeFilter AND count > 0 GROUP BY time(2s), host_id) group by time(2s) fill(0)
SELECT mean("duration_ms") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."validator-confirmation" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT MEAN("points_written") as "mean" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT MAX("points_written") as "max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage") as "cpu_usage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."system-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT max("ram_usage") as "ram_usage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."system-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("avg_gpu_usage") as "gpu_usage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."system-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("avg_gpu_mem_usage") as "gpu_memory_usage" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."system-stats" WHERE  hostname =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter   GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT SUM("points_written") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT SUM("points_lost") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("killed") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT sum("one") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."panic" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "program" fill(null)
SELECT sum("killed") as "." FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."oom-killer" WHERE $timeFilter   GROUP BY time($__interval), "victim", "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("count") as "mean" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."open-files" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT MAX("count") as "max" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."open-files" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null)
SELECT host_id, error, slot FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay-stage-mark_dead_slot"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT sum("count") AS "total_errors" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "account_in_use" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-account_in_use" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)

SELECT sum("count") AS "insufficient_funds" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-insufficient_funds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "invalid_account_for_fee" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-invalid_account_for_fee" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)
SELECT sum("count") AS "invalid_account_index" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."bank-process_transactions-error-invalid_account_index" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) FILL(0)

SELECT host_id,error FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blockstore_error"  WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT mean("num_shreds") AS "num_data_and_coding_shreds" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-transmit-shreds-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("end_to_end_elapsed") AS "end_to_end_elapsed" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-transmit-shreds-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("insert_shreds_elapsed") AS "insert_shreds_elapsed" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-insert-shreds-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("num_shreds") AS "num_data_and_coding_shreds" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-insert-shreds-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("end_to_end_elapsed") AS "end_to_end_elapsed" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."broadcast-insert-shreds-stats" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.description: (Must pick a host id for this to make sense)

targets.query: SELECT count("slot") AS "num_my_leader_slots" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-my_leader_slot" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)

panels.title: My Leader Slots ($hostid)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-buffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-forwarded_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-consumed_buffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."banking_stage-rebuffered_packets" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-honor_forwards" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."fetch_stage-discard_forwards" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("recovered") AS "recovered" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blockstore-erasure" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT max("num_blocks_on_fork") as "num_blocks" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blocks_produced" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND  $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT max("num_dropped_blocks_on_fork") as "num_dropped_blocks" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."blocks_produced" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT count("slot") AS "num_skipped" FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."replay_stage-skip_leader_slot"  WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND  $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT last("latest") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-vote" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("slot") - last("root") FROM "$testnet"."autogen"."tower-observed" WHERE host_id::tag =~ /$hostid/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Tower Distance in Latest and Root Slot ($hostid)
